All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddAppointmentController
    Controller for the AddAppointment form
    AddCustomerController
    Controller for the AddCustomer form
    Appointment
    Appointment class encapsulates the state information needed to properly communicate with the mySQL database
    Customer
    Customer class encapsulates the state information and behavior to properly communicate with the mySQL database
    JDBC
    database connection helper class
    Logger
    class used to log login attempts to login_activity.txt
    LoginController
    Controller for the login page.
    Main
    Main class contains the main method of the application and establishes a connection to the database.
    MainMenuController
    Controller for the MainMenu form
    UpdateAppointmentController
    Controller for the UpdateAppointment form //FUTURE ENHANCEMENT// reduce code redundancy by making this class a subclass of AddAppointmentController and overriding the addAppointment method to update the database as opposed to adding to it.
    UpdateCustomerController
    Controller for UpdateCustomer form
    User
    User class holds the state of the current user using the application
